function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Abandonment of environmental management practices like drainage of marshes and housing improvements","Impact":"Increase in mosquito-borne diseases like malaria due to lack of prevention measures","Mitigation":"Reintroduction of environmental management practices, community education, and investment in disease surveillance","Technologies":"Environmental engineering solutions, public health campaigns, and monitoring technology","People":"Populations living in mosquito-prone areas","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Parasite resistance to drugs and mosquito resistance to insecticides","Impact":"Ineffectiveness of malaria control measures and resurgence of the disease","Mitigation":"Research and development of new insecticides and drugs, integrated vector management approach, and community-based interventions","Technologies":"Genetic engineering for insecticide resistance, drug development, and community engagement platforms","People":"Health workers, researchers, and communities at risk of malaria","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reduced funding and lack of community participation","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of malaria control programs and inability to sustain interventions","Mitigation":"Increase in funding support, community engagement and empowerment initiatives, and advocacy for government involvement","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, community mobilization tools, and advocacy and lobbying resources","People":"Communities at risk of malaria, public health organizations, and government agencies","Owner":"Non-profit organizations, government health departments, and community leaders"}]}
